22 Nov 2024

6 New Business Books for Fans of Tom Peters

If you’re a fan of Tom Peters and his groundbreaking insights into business innovation, leadership, and customer obsession, you’re always on the lookout for books that challenge conventional thinking and inspire action. From bold takes on organizational culture to fresh perspectives on the future of work, the latest crop of business books offers plenty to dive into. Here are six must-reads that embody the energy, curiosity, and human-centered approach Peters champions—perfect for fueling your entrepreneurial spirit and sparking new ideas.

Estate Planning Essentials

by Maxwell Sterling

Release Date: October 6 2024

**Secure Your Legacy and Deliver Tranquility to Your Loved Ones in 5 Effortless Steps** “Discover the keys to estate planning, even if legal terms make you feel lost. Are the intricacies of estate planning overwhelming? Does the idea of ensuring your loved ones’ financial security seem like a daunting task? You’re not alone.” Introducing the ultimate guide to estate planning.

Buy on Amazon

The Slick Strategy: A Unique Profitable Options Trading Method

by Paul Caselli

Release Date: October 28 2024

For those seeking steady wealth growth and financial independence, The Slick Strategy offers a proven, reliable options trading method. Backtested over 10 years of historical market data and with an 88% success rate, this strategy consistently delivers gains, even with limited capital, market expertise, low risk tolerance, and minimal time.

Buy on Amazon

Rethinking Two Weeks’ Notice

by Robert Glazer

Release Date: November 19 2024

When an ending is the right decision, it happens with transparency, trust, and a solid transition. This book guides managers in creating open transition programs throughout their organizations so that everyone can find the right role.

Buy on Amazon

Boom: Bubbles and the End of Stagnation

by Byrne Hobart

Release Date: November 19 2024

Integrating insights from economics, philosophy, and history, Boom identifies the root causes of the Great Stagnation and provides a blueprint for accelerating innovation.

Buy on Amazon

Never Lead Alone: 10 Shifts from Leadership to Teamship

by Keith Ferrazzi

Release Date: November 12 2024

In today’s volatile, fast-paced, and decentralized business environment, even the most talented leaders can’t succeed alone—they need to mobilize the full potential of the team.

Buy on Amazon

Sales Sucks…But It Doesn’t Have To

by Mike Latch

Release Date: November 17 2024

Sales Sucks is the ultimate guide for CEOs, sales managers, and entrepreneurs ready to take their sales operations to the next level. Drawing from their two decades of experience as sales leaders in the solar industry that led to an $825M acquisition, authors Mike Latch and Gregg Murphy unveil the secrets behind transforming consultative sales efforts into high-performing, scalable systems.

Buy on Amazon
